text: The 2011–12 Tom Tomsk season is the 7th straight season that the club will play in the Russian Premier League, the highest tier of football in Russia. ==Current squad== As of 25 February 2012. ==Transfers== ===Winter=== In: Out: ===Summer=== In: Out: ===Winter=== In: Футбол.
